headline: Berkshire Hathaway Shifts As Buffett Exits And Abel Faces New Tests
summary: Warren Buffett is retiring as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE:BRK.B), with Greg Abel set to succeed him. Berkshire has adjusted its equity portfolio, selling holdings in Apple, Bank of America, and Amazon.com. The company has added to positions in Chevron and Chubb and opened a new stake in The New York Times Company. A Berkshire utility subsidiary has agreed to a substantial settlement to resolve federal wildfire damage claims. Berkshire is also selling certain assets to support balance...

headline: Waste-to-Hydrogen Industry Research Report 2025: An $825+ Mn Market by 2030, Driven by Advancements in Gasification and Pyrolysis Technologies and Focus on Industrial Decarbonization
summary: The Waste-to-Hydrogen Market, valued at USD 825.4 million in 2025, is expected to reach USD 50.9 million by 2035, exhibiting a robust CAGR of 32.12%. This market transforms waste into clean hydrogen fuel, aiding global decarbonization. Key technologies like gasification and plasma conversion enhance efficiency, fueled by government investments and the rising demand for sustainable energy. The chemical production segment leads, while innovations in carbon capture and AI optimize operations. Key p
